snippet: The list of other award recipients this year reflects the sometimes eclectic diversity of sources of electronic media in the Internet age. Right alongside BBC.com and NPR was the growing international news site GlobalPost and the Web site for the TED...
abstract: The list of other award recipients this year reflects the sometimes eclectic diversity of sources of electronic media in the Internet age. Right alongside BBC.com and NPR was the growing international news site GlobalPost and the Web site for the TED conference, TED.com.

headline.main: Showtime, HBO and CNN Garner Peabody Awards
headline.print_headline: Showtime, HBO and CNN Among Peabody Leaders
